DOC.HEADLINE: SOUTH_AFRICA GUERRILLA LEADER DIES IN CRASH
DOC.TEXT: The commander of the military wing of the radical Pan Africanist Congress of South_Africa , Victor Sabelo Phama , was killed in a car crash in southern Tanzania , government officials said Thursday . Phama died instantly Wednesday night when his car rammed into a stationary truck outside the town of Morogoro , 125 miles west of the capital Dar es Salaam , they added .
